Description:
Low Maintenance Living in the Heart of Craigieburn
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its low maintenance living & instant access to all Craigieburn amenities. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this is a MUST SEE!
Beyond its modern facade, this home offers 3 good size bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & ensuite), central bathroom with spa, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals & family room leading out to a great decked entertaining area.
Further features include, remote garage with internal access, evaporative cooling, heating, solar panels & much more.
Perfectly located close to Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare, sporting facilities, Highlands Shopping Centre, Golden Sun Moth Park & public transport. An opportunity not to be missed. Call now!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Versatile Style with Contemporary Flair
On a generous allotment surrounded by established gardens, this freshly renovated single-level home presents an outstanding family lifestyle opportunity with its free-flowing design, impressive enhancements & central convenience.
Beyond its distinctive rendered facade, the home's inviting interior comprises 4 bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), main family bathroom & separate WC.
Spacious living zones include a light-filled lounge leading through to the expansive open-plan living/dining area & adjoining kitchen with tiled splashbacks & gas cooktop.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating/refrigerated cooling for all-seasons comfort, security shutters & video intercom, large laundry & internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled), plus undercover outdoor entertaining area & backyard garden complete with large storage shed.
Easy access to the area's key lifestyle attractions including local parks & Malcolm Creek trails, primary & secondary schools, choice of shopping centres, as well as public transport options & the Hume Freeway.
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
Insights: 57 Riversdale Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Young Family Home!
Situated in the popular Highlands Estate with everything that you need around you, this young family home is one you will want to see. Built on a generous 448m2 block with space in the backyard for the kids to play and with something for everyone inside, everyone will feel at home.
A stylish well-appointed kitchen for the cook in the family is complete a spacious walk in pantry/preparation area, large stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, built in microwave and ample cupboard space overlooks the living and dining area which is adjacent to the rumpus room / second living area.
When it comes time to unwind, enjoy the large master bedroom with over sized walk in robe, double vanity and large shower, three further bedrooms with built in robes, serviced with a large central bathroom containing a modern bath.
Fantastic extras include alarm, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and alfresco. With Newbury Primary School, Sustainable Park, hockey field, public transport and shops all a short stroll away, look no further for your next family home or the one to add to your growing investment portfolio.
Call James today on 0466 642 032 for more details!
Insights: 11 Merrica Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Easy living, Spectacular Location & Amenities within meters!
The Eleet Wyndham City & Sahil Kakar are proud to present this beautiful low maintenance, spacious 3 bed, 2 bath and double garage- Simonds Home in an uncompromising location of Craigieburn! Walking distance to public transport, minutes away from highlands shopping centre, Craigieburn Central neighbouring all eateries, parkland, play areas and all other amenities one can think off!
This perfectly suits any first home buyers to step into an year old home or investors looking to add a vibrant asset to there portfolio! This street is just off ever popular Mt Ridley Road which presents perfect opportunity of walking distance to Hume Anglican Grammar School and Mt Ridley view point.
Quality features and fittings include
**Master with ensuite,
**Ducted heating,
**Split cooling,
**Double garage with inside and rear access,
**900mm cooktop/oven & stainless steel kitchen appliances,
**Playground right outside the home &
**Close to all schools, childcare & kindergarten
A home to enjoy for many years to come, don't miss this opportunity as it wont last long!
Inspect it to believe it!! Auction on 01/06/2019 at 3:00PM.
Call Sahil on 0401 926 466 for any further information.
**Eligible First Home Buyer pay $0 Stamp Duty**( Please visit SRO's website to check your eligibility)

Description:
Immense Potential on 712sqm!
Sitting on a more than generous allotment of 712sqm approx in a peaceful court, you will discover this property in a prime Craigieburn location within a stones throw to Schools, Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Station, Hume Hwy and much more.
The property comprises of 3 generous size bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite and a central bathroom. Entry leads to your lounge room adjoining to your separate dining area. Well maintained original kitchen offering ample cupboard, pantry & bench space, overlooking a spacious family meals area.
Step outside and discover an abundance of land space to entertain family all year round.
The possibilities here are endless, whether you are searching for that ideal family location on a large block or looking to develop in the area (STCA), you wont go wrong here!
SEALED BID: Monday 3rd June 2019 at 7:00pm
Call Eddi Bagdadi on 0432 208 933 for more information

Description:
Affordable Modern Style with Impressive Family Credentials
Ideally situated in one of the area's most popular neighbourhoods, this single-level home delivers an environment of outstanding space & family flexibility along with easy access to the best of Craigieburn.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms, walk-in robe & ensuite to a massive master bedroom, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large scale family gatherings & fully equipped stone-top kitchen with great storage & ample cupboard bench space.
Located to perfection, with just a short stroll to a local park, all levels of schooling, close to Craigieburn Central, bus stop & jam-packed with extras including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, double remote garage with internal & external access, sparkling central bathroom, roomy laundry & much much more!
If spacious low-maintenance living & location are high on your agenda, then this home needs to be on your inspection list!

Description:
Hop On Home
YPA Craigieburn exclusively presents this brand new relaxed family home on a generous allotment with its contemporary façade. This architecturally designed residence has been thoughtfully crafted and precisely executed with lifestyle and exclusivity in mind.
Its sprawling floor plan boasts 4 luxurious bedrooms, 2 deluxe bathrooms, extensive light filled living areas, double car garage and all complemented with a landscaped front and backyard.
Just completed & ready to simply move in & enjoy, this sparkling new home is sure to exceed all expectations with its impressive single-level floorplan, long list of features, along with the peace of mind knowing everything has been done for you.
Step inside & you will discover a free-flowing design showcasing 4 generous size bedrooms (3 with robes), stylish master with ensuite plus walk in robe & a main family bathroom. Accompanied by a first-class kitchen with soft-close cabinetry, stainless steel cooking appliances (900mm) & a dishwasher that overlooks a spacious open plan family living & dining room, and a low maintained rear yard. Extras include ducted heating, split system cooling and alarm system.
**FIRST HOME BUYERS entitled to first home owners grant subject to eligibility **
Do not miss out on this ultra-modern home as surely a property this beautiful will not stay around for long!
Sealed Bid: 24/06/19 Monday at 7.00pm

Description:
Luxury, Lifestyle and Family Living
Sitting on a generous sized block, this home is full of quality finishes throughout. Comprising of 4 bedrooms with mirrored BIR's (master inc full ensuite with double shower), large family bathroom, kids retreat with study nook, separate formal lounge, kitchen with 60mm stone benches, glass splash back, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, island bench and pantry with coffee maker appliance and a spacious open plan living/meals area with by fold doors that open out to the undercover entertaining area with decking.
Added features include Aqua Tuf floorboards throughout, high ceilings, alarm system with surveillance, plantation shutters, roller shutters, led lights, ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, ducted vacuum system, projector screen, outdoor BBQ & fridge, double garage with internal access and a separate side driveway that can cater for a truck, caravan or boat.
Set in a convenient location, you will enjoy the lifestyle amenities that this neighbourhood has to offer. Within close proximity to community centres, childcare facilities and schools, parks and recreational reserves, the family friendly entertainment complex Highlands Hotel, major shopping centres including Craigieburn North and Craigieburn Central. Also within easy access to the train station and major roads.
The perfect home to enjoy so many lifestyle amenities at your door step or for young and growing families to live in a community with an abundant of essential services. Inspections will definitely impress the astute buyer.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
219-221 High Street Thomastown 3074
767 High Street Epping 3076
510 Plenty Road Mill Park 3082
952-954 High Street Reservoir 3073

Description:
Come get your FREE coffee This Saturday from 11:30am
This is where the search ends for any savvy investor or first home buyer.
Perfectly positioned in a very family orientated location, this home that sits on a massive 658m2 (approx) of land offers the best of family living.
Featuring a formal step down lounge, formal dining, three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and built in robes in remaining bedrooms, open-plan living/meals area, bathroom, laundry and two toilets. Not to mention a huge sun room overlooking the picturesque rear garden.
Other features include;
* Central heating
* Evap cooling
* Ceiling fans
* Lock up carport
* walking distance to transport, schools and all key amenities.
Be sure to inspect 12 Edington Way Craigieburn because if you miss out on this opportunity, you'll be sure to kick yourself.

Description:
A Family Favourite
Set in the always popular Fairways estate, amongst quality homes and in a quiet pocket sits this sizeable family home. Close by to the Craigieburn Central and conveniently located close to Aitken boulevard gives this property a most ideal location. Comprising of Master bedroom, with Large walk in Wardrobe and ensuite completed with Spa Bath, Generous and well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, meals and adjoining family room, Formal lounge, theatre room, main bathroom and a sizeable Laundry are just some of the many features of this beautiful home. Not to mention ducted heating, ducted cooling, additional split system cooling, double lock up garage with remote control and internal access, roller shutters, solar panels, low maintenance front and back gardens and much much more. Close by to schools, parks and walking trails, public transport this home has a lot to offer. An Inspection will not disappoint, Call now to Book An Appointment..

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
***SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437***The allure of an exclusive, quiet cul-de-sac location in a Highlands Estate setting complements the exceptional quality of this vibrant, versatile contemporary residence. Instantly impressive spaces for living and dining that make each day a delight served by a sohisticated kitchen featuring stone surfaces, Westinghouse stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar/island bench and ample integrated storage. Beyond, an elegant paved courtyard creates great environs for entertaining while 3 upstairs carpeted bedrooms with BIR's and 2 bathrooms include a main bedroom accompanied by an ensuite and a balcony with beautiful outlooks. The outstanding accommodation appreciates the flexibility of a 4th bedroom, office, rumpus room, retreat or 'man cave' above the double garage, as well as central heating, s/system heating/cooling, timber floors and instantaneous hot water. With an impressive position, opposite parkland, bike paths and Highlands Lake, is walking distance from Waterside Café and Craigieburn Central. Such a fabulous location ensures the lifestyle matches the luxury of a home devised and designed to deliver the best of everything - and it does! Currently tenanted for $1651 p.c.m also poses a sensational investment for the savvy investor.

Description:
Huge Home On 700m2 Of Land With No Easements...
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this LARGE 36.5sq Henley built residence offers plenty of room for the growing family.
From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. Features including kitchen featuring granite bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, adjoining meals area overlooking the family room. Large rumpus room, Theatre room completed with a snack bar, large study, generous sized master with ensuite completed with stone benchtops and dual vanities, walk in robe and balcony, 4 additional bedrooms, 2 additional bathrooms, upstairs retreat and much much more.
Not to mention features including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, coonara wood fire heater, double lock up garage with internal access, side access to make best use of the large backyard and ample storage opportunities for the boat, caravan or trailer. Low maintenance front and back gardens and the list goes on
Close by to schools, public transport, beautiful parklands and walking trails, both new and old shopping centres as well as the new Splash Aqua park and Leisure centre
This home really is the complete package. INSPECTION A MUST!!

Description:
Modern, young and low maintenance home on a 313 sqm allottment!
The ELEET Wyndham City & Sahil Kakar- Proudly Presents this modern, meticulously built Simonds home (approx. 2 years old) will sway you at the outset, with its elegant design, its aesthetic appeal and its sheer virtuosity in space usage. It is situated in a popular location off Mt Ridley Road in a harmonious centre of Craigieburn!!
Exquisitely maintained, it's been a home to caring tenant, thereby providing an excellent opportunity for a first home buyer or for an investor to reap the benefits of a rewarding investment.
With extremely close proximity to Hume Anglican Grammar School, public transport, Newbury Primary School, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central and easy Hume freeway access, this is an exquisite home for all needs.
The Master bedroom, walk in robe, a natural light infused en suite and vanity. Other 2 bedrooms are spacious and comprise of BIRs, the kitchen is a chef's reverie with modern 900 mm stainless steel gas cooker, 40 mm stone bench top, range hood and a spacious pantry.
Overall the residence is equipped with top quality fixtures and fittings throughout and is beautifully presented that is guaranteed to impress the owners and visitors alike!
** Master with En suite & WIR
** Other 2 Bedrooms w/ BIR'S
** 2 Bathrooms
** Double Garage
** Low Maintenance Outdoor
** Ducted Heating
** High Ceilings and LED Downlights
** Walking distance to schools, childcares and kindergarten
** 900 mm Stainless Steel Appliances
Call Sahil on 0401 926 466 Or Sachin on 0433 110 100 to arrange an inspection as this won't last long. Auction on 01/06/2019 @3:30pm!
$0.00 Stamp Duty for eligible first home buyers(Please check SRO's website for your eligibility)*

Description:
Maintenance-Free Designer Living
Arranged over three levels with an eye-catching contemporary designer edge and a love of low maintenance urban flair, this bold, 3 bedroom townhouse makes a clear statement in style. Presented in as new condition, this flawless family-sized home allows you to simply move in, do absolutely nothing and enjoy a relaxed lifestyle in one of Melbournes most flourishing locations.
Superbly appointed, on the first floor, with fine appliances and stone bench tops, the kitchen / meals flows seamlessly out to an entertainers-sized balcony for al fresco dining and stylish home entertaining. Also on the first floor, a semi-attached lounge room is a warm and welcoming space.
The bedrooms are all well-proportioned with beautifully crafted and spacious built-in robes. At ground-level, the master bedroom is a large and sophisticated retreat with its own ensuite, whilst, on the top level, the other bedrooms share convenient access to the main bathroom. Also upstairs, a clever study nook utilities the space beautifully, to serve home office needs or alternately present another place for children to play
Discover why Craigeburn is such a thriving part of one of Melbournes key growth corridors. Easy city access via either train or the Freeway counterbalance the pure joy of a position near vast expanses of parkland, wonderful local shopping, Golf Courses and easy airport access.

Sitting on a generous 759sqm corner allotment and located in a beautiful "Fairways Estate" within close proximity to public transport, schools and Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn Golf Course and easy access to Aitkin BLVD. This over sized single storey home featuring 2 separate living zones including formal lounge, large kitchen with ample cupboard space overlooking adjoining a large open plan family and meals area with access to a huge outdoor entertaining area, 5 bedrooms (2 masters with full ensuite & WIR), central bathroom, separate toilet, spacious laundry, double garage, second driveway with drive through access to the side of the house ideal for extra vehicles, boats, trailers, etc. Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, window furnishing, s/steel appliances, dishwasher, second kitchen, and much more.

Description:
Perfect home for the growing family
An opportunity not to be missed. Priced to sell, this home is perfect for a first home buyer wanting to grow a family or a savvy investor looking for a low maintenance property with land. This spacious three bedroom home has built in robes in two rooms, two bathrooms, one of which is an en-suite to the master bedroom and two toilets. In addition, there's a huge covered outdoor area for entertaining and a massive land allotment of 650 square metres approximately, enough room to install a playground, swimming pool, or maybe even a granny flat (S.T.C.A). Does your family have multiple cars or a truck or two? No problem there's heaps of parking space! Other features include heating, ceiling fans, split system, separate laundry and, heaps of storage.
This neat and tidy three bedroom home is conveniently located in a family oriented neighbourhood, a short walk away from Main Street Shopping Mall, a selection of buses on Craigieburn Road, a selection of popular restaurants, and for the kids there's Willmot Park Primary School, Mount Ridley College, a choice of nearby parks and reserves to visit.
Be sure to inspect to avoid missing out. Sale By Close Date 20/07/19 but may sell sooner!
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection

Description:
Exclusive Townhouse, Central to Everything
Sophisticated and stylish with a low maintenance commitment to quality, this bright and spacious, 2 bedroom townhouse is immaculately presented in as new condition. Distinguished by quality, the home is filled with natural light and features two generous balconies in this wonderful position near Highlands Shopping Centre, cafes and beautiful parkland.
With a crisp white colour palate, the homes kitchen / meals / living is generously sized, upstairs and perfectly on trend with stainless steel Blanco kitchen appliances, plenty of cupboard storage and superb polished hardwood flooring. Two balconies offer the opportunity for a fresh indoor-outdoor connection and terrific home entertaining.
Downstairs, the bedrooms are each equipped with particularly large, mirrored, built-in robes for excellent storage, while the bathroom presents an independent bath and shower and the home also features a lock-up garage to complete the picture of supreme convenience.
Additional features include reverse cycle air conditioning, intercom entry, a European laundry and a striking glass staircase in this coveted growth-corridor position.
Insights: 336 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional Value, Family Home
From the moment you step inside you will be delighted with the warmth this family home has to offer.
With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Just some of the comforts on hand include master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals area. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight surrounded by low maintenance gardens, under cover alfresco area, a double garage, ducted heating and split system cooling makes this the complete package. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates amongst quality homes & parkland, with all the amenities close by including schools, shopping centres, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Golden Opportunity In Prized Location!!
Perfectly located in one of Craigieburn prized locations and close to schools, shops and transport. Be inspired by this beautiful home that would be the envy of all your family and friends.
Stylish and sophisticated it includes 3 bedrooms, Master has a full ensuite and WIR. Add to this a classy modern kitchen with 900 mm Caesar stone benches, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher all overlooking the spacious dining, living and a private lounge. Outside offers a double car garage with internal access to back.
• Close to Schools
• Close to public transport
• Close to Highland shopping Centre and Highlander Hotel
• Rental return currently leasing 360 per week.
**PHOTOS ARE FOR ILLUSTRATIVE PURPOSES ONLY**
Note: This property is leased with 1 year rental agreement and leased out for $1564 per calendar month.

Description:
Family-friendly Living on approx 576m2
Designed to take full advantage of its oversized allotment, this 4 bedroom family home presents an exciting lifestyle with its versatile floorplan, quality features throughout & prime location close to all of Craigieburn's desirable amenities.
Greeted by an expansive entrance hallway, the home's free-flowing interior boasts a large master bedroom with ensuite & walk-in-robe, additional bedrooms all with built-in-robes, separate designated study & well appointed stylish main bathroom. Multiple living zones include a separate formal lounge, spacious open-plan living & dining area enhanced by a gourmet stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard space.
Step outside and entertain with a oversized backyard providing great space for kids to play. Other features include heating, cooling, instant hot water, al-fresco area, plus the added advantage of a remote control double garage with internal access.
Within walking distance to Malcolm Creek Linear Park, Hyde Park Reserve, Craigieburn Primary School, Mount Ridley College, State Swim Centre, Childcare centres, local sports facilities, public transport & much more, this home offers great family living in a family-friendly location.
Insights: 46 Middlesborough Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
